revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Accton |model=MR3202A |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/31/2007 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=True |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=HEDMR3202A |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2317 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620ETP-H |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2317 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996FC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Wireless Network 1 |default_ssid_regex=^Wireless Network 1$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui=00:12:CF |oui_eth=00:12:CF }} ''802.11b/g Mini AP Router''
"141320220000E R01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Default settings (and a presumed used OUI [00:12:CF]) is per the FCC manual. :The manual shows screenshots of the web UI indicating that the stock firmware is based on X-Wrt and OpenWrt (with a GPLv2 notice). :Default SSIDs per additional new VIF follow the '''Wireless Network X''' pattern (next VIF being 2, one after that being 3, etc).
